name: roundup
description: Roundup is a self-hosted issue tracker with a flexible schema, email support, and web-based interface for managing tasks and issues in software or business workflows.
features: Issue tracking: Create and manage bug reports, feature requests, and tasks.
Flexible schema: Customize fields, statuses, and workflows to match your process.
Email integration: Create or update issues by sending emails to the tracker.
Web interface: Access and manage issues through a browser-based UI.
Search and filter: Find issues using powerful queries across all fields.
File attachments: Upload documents, screenshots, or logs to issues.
User management: Control access with roles and permissions for different team members.
Activity tracking: View complete history of changes and comments on each issue.
Custom workflows: Define status transitions and required fields for different issue types.
Notification system: Send email alerts when issues are created, updated, or assigned.
Reporting: Generate summaries and statistics on issue status and resolution times.
Template support: Create issue templates for common bug reports or requests.
